categories.description:
An array of category strings corresponding to this link. This allows highlighting and filtering of links.
By default, the label is used as the link category.

endLocation.description: An object used to determine the end point of the link.

id.description: The marker or area id to be used as the end point.

location.description:
An identifier corresponding to a Feature provided in the mapProvider geo object
to be used as the end point.

x.description: The x coordinate which can represent latitude of the end point.

y.description: The y coordinate which can represent latitude of the end point.

selectable.description: Specifies whether or not the link will be selectable.

shortDesc.description: The text that displays in the link's tooltip.

startLocation.description: An object used to determine the start point of the link.

id.description: The marker or area id to be used as the start point.

location.description:
An identifier corresponding to a Feature provided in the mapProvider geo object
to be used as the start point.

x.description: The x coordinate which can represent latitude of the start point.

y.description: The y coordinate which can represent latitude of the start point.

svgClassName.description: The CSS style class defining the style of the link.

svgStyle.description: The CSS style object defining the style of the link.
